proposed_new_asks.ask_description: Customers are asking for clarification on whether a business account needs to be a user or can just be a shared mailbox.
Customers want a way to automatically classify contacts into categories like individual inquiries and corporate inquiries.
Customers are looking for an automated way to export contacts along with their associated tags.

proposed_new_asks.ask_name: Analytics for Inquiries and Sales Tracking
proposed_new_asks.ask_description: Customers are asking for access to analytics that help them track inquiries and sales performance.
